data.eml:eml: A catalogue of the Heteroptera (Hemiptera) or true bugs of Argentina

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Coscarón, María Del Carmen (2017): A catalogue of the Heteroptera (Hemiptera) or true bugs of Argentina. Zootaxa 4295 (1): 1-432, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4295.1.1
